welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Chamblee, where Southern hospitality meets modern city living. Known for its diverse community and delicious international cuisine, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at College Park Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'ATL Free Wi-Fi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and corporate aircraft and offers exclusive services for its passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network for free by connecting to the designated network name.
